polytech.devint.view

Class ContextHelp

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.view.ContextHelp

  • public class ContextHelp
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent an "help" that could be use in a game for example, or when switching menu to help the user to know what he can do
    Author:
    Loris Friedel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextHelp()
      Instantiate a default context help, empty.
      ContextHelp(java.lang.String text)
      Instantiate a context help that do not contains an associated audio nor detailed help text and sound No associated audio means the text will be played be the voice synthesis when needed
      ContextHelp(java.lang.String text, Sound audio)
      Instantiate a context help with its associated audio but not details help text and audio
      ContextHelp(java.lang.String text, Sound audio, java.lang.String detailedText)
      Instantiate a context help with its associated audio and only the details help text (not its associated audio)
      ContextHelp(java.lang.String text, Sound audioHelp, java.lang.String detailedText, Sound detailedAudioHelp)
      Instantiate a context help with its associated audio and the details help text with its associated detailed audio
      ContextHelp(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String detailedText)
      Instantiate a context help without an associated audio and only the details help text without an associated audio too All text will be played by the voice synthesis if needed

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextHelp

        public ContextHelp()
        Instantiate a default context help, empty.

      • ContextHelp

        public ContextHelp(java.lang.String text,
                   Sound audioHelp,
                   java.lang.String detailedText,
                   Sound detailedAudioHelp)
        Instantiate a context help with its associated audio and the details help text with its associated detailed audio
        Parameters:
        text - help text of the context
        audioHelp - the audio of the help (a voice recording for example)
        detailedText - detailed help text of the context
        detailedAudioHelp - the audio of the detailed help (a voice recording for example)

      • ContextHelp

        public ContextHelp(java.lang.String text,
                   Sound audio,
                   java.lang.String detailedText)
        Instantiate a context help with its associated audio and only the details help text (not its associated audio)
        Parameters:
        text - help text of the context
        audio - the audio of the help (a voice recording for example)
        detailedText - detailed help text of the context

      • ContextHelp

        public ContextHelp(java.lang.String text,
                   java.lang.String detailedText)
        Instantiate a context help without an associated audio and only the details help text without an associated audio too All text will be played by the voice synthesis if needed
        Parameters:
        text - help text of the context
        detailedText - detailed help text of the context
